N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 275.4 - Rapid posting of payments in response to notices of discontinuance

State Regulations

Every gas corporation shall take reasonable steps to
establish procedures to insure that any payments made in response to notices of
discontinuance, when the customer brings the fact that such a notice has been
issued to the attention of the company or its collection agents, shall
either: (a) be posted to the
customer's account on the day payment is received; or
(b) be processed in some manner so that
discontinuance will not occur. Notes
